titles.title: State Veterans Home Program Improvement Act of 2017
State Veterans Home Program Improvement Act of 2017

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the administration of State homes furnishing care to veterans under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
State Veterans Home Program Improvement Act of 2017
This bill sets forth provisions regarding how states can use funds paid by the Veterans Administration for the treatment of veterans at a state home.
